SEARCH
Package org.demoiselle.signer.policy.impl.cades.pkcs7.attribute

Interface SignedOrUnsignedAttribute

All Known Subinterfaces:
SignedAttribute, UnsignedAttribute
All Known Implementing Classes:
ArchiveTimestampV2, CertificateRefs, CertValues, ContentType, EscTimeStamp, IdSigningPolicy, MessageDigest, RevocationRefs, RevocationValues, SigningCertificate, SigningCertificateV2, TimeStampToken
public interface SignedOrUnsignedAttribute
CMS (rfc3852) defines some attributes that appear in digital signatures. There is a set of attributes that are required for the CAdES format. Depending on the subscription policy, more attributes may be required.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      void initialize(PrivateKey privateKey, Certificate[] certificates, byte[] content, org.demoiselle.signer.policy.engine.asn1.etsi.SignaturePolicy signaturePolicy, byte[] hash)
      Performs the initial parameterization for attribute retrieval
      Parameters:
      privateKey - private key
      certificates - certificate chain
      content - set null if signing only hash
      signaturePolicy - signature policy
      hash - set null if signing content

    • getOID

      String getOID()
      OID value of the attribute. Ex: "1.12.2.54.94"
      Returns:
      OID of attribute
